task_templates.name: Create Relocation Request
task_templates.description: Employer creates detailed relocation request with employee information
task_templates.instructions: Complete employee information form, select relocation package, provide special requirements

task_templates.name: Sign Power of Attorney
task_templates.description: Sign legal authorization for relocation services
task_templates.instructions: Review and digitally sign the Power of Attorney document

task_templates.name: Schedule Initial Consultation
task_templates.description: Book first meeting with assigned relocation agent
task_templates.instructions: Select convenient time slot from agent's available calendar

task_templates.name: Upload Required Documents
task_templates.description: Upload all required documents based on destination country checklist
task_templates.instructions: Connect storage provider and upload all documents from the provided checklist

task_templates.name: Process Work Permit Application
task_templates.description: Submit and track work permit application with authorities
task_templates.instructions: Prepare and submit work permit application to immigration authorities

task_templates.name: Arrange Temporary Accommodation
task_templates.description: Secure temporary housing for employee arrival
task_templates.instructions: Research and book suitable temporary accommodation based on employee preferences

task_templates.name: Upload Flight Information
task_templates.description: Provide flight details for arrival coordination
task_templates.instructions: Upload flight tickets and provide arrival details
